text_block_list.text:
It's almost time for the URA awards<n>ceremony, and I'm
waiting for the<n>broadcast of my mentor's big<n>moment.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Knock, knock! You in here, Trainer?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Ah, there you are! Got a minute? I<n>wanted to talk to you
about the Derby<n>exhibit.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I was thinking about the stuff we'll<n>show. But, like... I
wanna make things<n>easier to understand.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Right now it's kinda just a spread ofinformation. But what I really want isfor people to be floored by whatthey see!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I thought maybe you'd have a good<n>idea. Thinking up ideas
isn't really my<n>thing, hehe...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Something flooring, huh? How about<n>you go into detail on
what you feel<n>most passionately about?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Something flooring, huh? How about<n>you go into detail on
what you feel<n>most passionately about?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: What I feel most passionately about?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Whenever you talk about the Derby,<n>you always tell me
what each runner<n>was thinking and feeling, right?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Whenever you talk about the Derby,<n>you always tell me
what each runner<n>was thinking and feeling, right?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Oh, I get it! So I should show the stuff<n>that has all the juicy
lore!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I've already got some other items I<n>put together that might
work! All right,<n>time to make a sweet exhibit!

Winning Ticket wants to start<n>organizing the displays, but
the<n>broadcast is about to begin.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Before that, mind if I watch something<n>on TV? My mentor's
receiving a URA<n>award.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Before that, mind if I watch something<n>on TV? My mentor's
receiving a URA<n>award.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Oh, Oguri's trainer, right? I'll watch<n>too! This should be
good!

I turn the TV on, and in a few<n>moments, the ceremony I've
been<n>anticipating begins.

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
Congratulations on your URA award!<n>In your long years of
training, is there<n>a race that stands out above the rest?

text_block_list.name: Predecessor
text_block_list.text:
Well, I feel strongly about all the<n>runners I've worked with.
So each<n>race has a special place in my heart.

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
This award commemorates all your<n>amazing achievements.
How did you<n>feel when you heard you'd be<n>receiving it?

text_block_list.name: Predecessor
text_block_list.text:
Oh, I was so happy. I couldn't believe<n>it... I wondered how I
could deserve it.

text_block_list.name: Predecessor
text_block_list.text:
Not every racer's dreams came true.<n>I was never able to
lead one of my<n>own to victory in the Derby, after all.

text_block_list.name: Predecessor
text_block_list.text:
I sure wanted it though, same as<n>anyone involved in racing.
They say a<n>Derby win's the greatest honor one<n>can
achieve.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Huh? So he never won the Derby...

I didn't realize until now, but of all the<n>big titles he attained,
not one was the<n>Derby.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
I always hear that it's the pinnacle of<n>racing, but not even a
veteran trainer<n>like him could win it.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
I always hear that it's the pinnacle of<n>racing, but not even a
veteran trainer<n>like him could win it.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
You know, the Derby was the very<n>first big race of the
Twinkle Series.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Ever since it began, lots of dramas<n>have been made about
the amazing<n>racers who've tried so hard to win it.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
And everyone's super-duper serious<n>about it! That's why
it's a huge<n>challenge for even a veteran trainer<n>and the
most skilled racers to win.

The fact that even my old mentor<n>couldn't win it convinces
me of<n>Winning Ticket's point.

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
You even participated in a Derby once<n>where your runner
was the favorite to<n>win, but in the end, she didn't<n>manage
to clinch victory, right?

text_block_list.name: Predecessor
text_block_list.text:
Ah, I remember it well. I trained her<n>until she was all but
assured of<n>victory. Even so, her rivals gave her<n>the slip in
the final stretch.

text_block_list.name: Predecessor
text_block_list.text:
Some people said if only we'd done<n>this or that, we
would've come out on<n>top. But she'd given it everything
she<n>had—I knew I couldn't let myself think<n>like them.

text_block_list.name: Predecessor
text_block_list.text:
I told her not to regret a thing—just<n>remember that she put
her whole<n>heart into it. Learn and push forward...<n>That's
what I realized we needed to<n>do in the end.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
They're talking about the first Derby I<n>ever saw! I watched
it right at the<n>track with my mom!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: You were at the Derby he's talking<n>about?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I'm sure of it! It was anabsolutely amazing race!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Even though his racer was the<n>favorite, she fell behind. But
she was<n>so focused on winning that she never<n>gave up,
even until the very end!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I finally understood how precious the<n>Derby is after seeing
that. That's why<n>I fell in love with it.

Winning Ticket is enthralled with the<n>Derby. It all stems from
her seeing it<n>once as a kid, and that was the very<n>Derby
my mentor and his trainee<n>fought so hard in.

text_block_list.name: Predecessor
text_block_list.text:
I ended up retiring before I could ever<n>win it... Now a
member of Team Sirius<n>carries on the dream though.

text_block_list.name: Predecessor
text_block_list.text: I truly believe that trainer can finally<n>grab the title.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hey, that's about you, right? He said<n>you can win it!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Yeah...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Yeah...

It feels like my old teacher can see<n>me from the other side
of the TV. Like<n>he's saying, "Here's the dream.<n>You've
got this, kid."

It feels like my old teacher can see<n>me from the other side
of the TV. Like<n>he's saying, "Here's the dream.<n>You've
got this, kid."

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
A dream yet unfulfilled... It dawns on<n>me that I've been
given something<n>very precious. My mentor really<n>believes
in me...
choice_data_list: It would be nice to win the Derby...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
A dream yet unfulfilled... It dawns on<n>me that I've been
given something<n>very precious. My mentor really<n>believes
in me...
choice_data_list: It would be nice to win the Derby...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Wha?! So you're gonna go after it?!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: WAAAH! Now that's a story! Amaster who passes on the dream hecouldn't achieve to his pupil!
Like she says, the whole thing does<n>feel like a story.

Right when I'm asked to help with an<n>exhibit, I end up
meeting someone<n>whose dream is winning the Derby.

And right when Winning Ticket comes<n>to the trainers' office,
we hear my<n>mentor talk about it. It's all<n>connected...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: The announcer's pretty good atinterviewing too! I'm blown awaythat I got to hear this Derby story!
Could this be fate? It certainly feels<n>like it.
choice_data_list: Hey, how about we go for it together?
Hey, how about we go for it together?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Huh? By "it," you mean...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: W-wait... Go for the Derby? W-w-with<n>me?!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Yeah, you want to win the Derby,<n>right?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Yeah, you want to win the Derby,<n>right?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Darn right I do! I've gotta win it!<n>That's been my dream
since I was<n>little!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Well, now I feel like I've got to win it<n>too.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Well, now I feel like I've got to win it<n>too.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: So if you're up for it, let's go for it<n>together.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: So if you're up for it, let's go for it<n>together.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: For... for real? You sure you wanna<n>partner up with me?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Aaah... Uwaaaaagh!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
WOOHOOOOO! I GOT SCOUTED! Let's<n>do it, Trainer! Let's
win the Derby!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ehehe! I'm gonna earn you the title<n>of "Derby trainer"!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
All right. And I'm going to help you<n>earn the title of "Derby
champion."

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
All right. And I'm going to help you<n>earn the title of "Derby
champion."

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Sweet! I'm super stoked to be<n>working with you! All riiight!
Let's go<n>for the Derby!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I'm Winning Ticket. Pleasure to meet<n>you!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Wow, someone with some real pep<n>joined the gang.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I've heard much about you, Ticket.<n>Your goal is to win the
Derby, yes?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
A great many racers share that goal.<n>You'll have plenty of
rivals, but we'll<n>help you pursue this dream together.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Thanks! I promise to get Team Sirius<n>a Derby victory!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Ticket's drive for the Derby is the<n>real deal. I'm counting on
you all to<n>give her your full support!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, right on! Let's move out,<n>newbie! The sun shines on
us today!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah! Here we come, DEEERBYYY!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
That's the spirit! I'm right there with<n>ya! To the
DEEERBYYY!

And so the curtains rise on the story<n>of Winning Ticket and
her pursuit of<n>victory at the Japanese Derby.
